org.xbib.catalog.entities.matching

Interface Key<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type parameter
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.Collection<T>, java.lang.Iterable<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultKey, GermanNameKey, MemberComponent, NameKey, OrdinalComponent, PublicationType, TitleKey, YearKey

    public interface Key<T>
extends java.util.Collection<T>

    A key consists of a list of elements which are added to this component. After adding, all elements are encoded for being combined with other components into a cluster key.
